Table server side (ngTasty.table)

A lightweight table directive with sorting, pagination and filtering support.

Settings can be provided as attributes in the <tasty-table>.

  • resource-callback : The function callback.

  • init : The default initialization object.

  • filters (Defaults: {}) : The filters object.

Settings can be provided as attributes in the <tasty-thead>.

  • not-sort-by (Defaults: [ ]) : list key columns not want sort, if is empty will not sort any column.

Settings can be provided as attributes in the <tasty-pagination>.

  • items-per-page (Defaults: 5) : Maximum number of items per page.

  • list-items-per-page (Defaults: [5, 25, 50, 100]) : list possible choice for items per page.

  • template-url (Defaults: 'template/table/pagination.html') : a path to a template representing pagination's content.
